{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=D7000 |revision=v2 |asin= |series=AC1900 |fcc_date=04/17/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router, dsl modem, |fcc_id=PY316400356 |us_id=5NHDL01B00356 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |cpu1_model=PXB4395EL;Intel, AnyWAN GRX350, PXB4395EL1600, S6223N01, SLLFB; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |wi1_chip1_model=PSB83523M;Intel, WAV500, S626L01, 0T3C; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |wi2_chip1_model=PSB83513M;Intel, WAV500, S6224L100, 0SZN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=DSL Line Driver/Front End (VRX318);Lantiq (Intel);PSB 80318;W619AK03, SLLEA;1; |flags=256QAM, ADSL2+, VDSL2, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 WiFi VDSL/ADSL Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/dsl-modems-routers/D7000.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=D7000v2}} {{•}} [https://www.netgear.com/images/datasheet/networking/dslmodem/D7000v2.pdf Datasheet] The radios are probably [[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV513 and WAV523 though the IDs :visible in the FCC photos don't point to any specific currently known model. The hardware should support MU-MIMO although Netgear does not appear to be :advertising MU-MIMO support anywhere for this product so it may not be enabled. * Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net {{see also|Phicomm K3C A1}} ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] [https://ark.intel.com/products/92553/Intel-AnyWAN-GRX350-Network-Processors GRX350] @800MHz Dual Core (MIPS [http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lantiq-announces-carrier-class-network-processing-for-home-gateway-300050735.html interAptiv]) *Wireless chipset: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] [http://www.intel.la/content/dam/www/public/us/en/documents/product-briefs/xway-wi-fi-chipset-wav500-series-brief.pdf WAV500] (PSB 83513/83523) *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 600Mbps for 2.4GHz, 1300Mbps for 5GHz
